exclusion of columns is not remembered when I restart Chainsaw.

The Tab Identifier in use is PROP.metro2.hostname, which gives the host name of
the server issuing the LogEvent (an in-house custom extension to XMLLayout
handles this).

My C:\Documents and Settings\t510242\.chainsaw folder does contain
HOSTNAME.columns files, but they seem to be disregarded.
